item.title: Halloween Story!
item.description: It’s my first Halloween since I started writing fiction, so of course I was going to try my hand at the classic costume-gone-wrong tale. It’s a light, trope-filled romp that I had so much fun writing and I hope everyone enjoys reading! Also I’m super excited to try a different style of illustration, hand-drawn pulp fiction/graphic novel style seemed like a great fit for the subject matter. Let me know what you think!

item.title: Time for a Site Relaunch Already?
item.description:
The site is a work in progress, but I’ve finally landed on a template I like so I’m relaunching and hoping to go from here! My goal is to eventually post here when I’ve added a new chapter to a story. And eventually, I’d like to host collected, polished “Author’s Editions” of my works here in PDF form, for easy reading!

Stay tuned, lots more to come!
